channel.title: Somebody, Can ya please help me with this..?
channel.description: Ok, im using freescape. Im trying to change what the npc's are saying. But after i edit the npchandler.java file i save it, and the settings dont apply when i run the server. I think i need to use the compiler or something...but i just don't know how. Can someone tell me how to use the compiler? (with npchandler)

item.title: Somebody, Can ya please help me with this..?
item.dc:creator: @dakota72421 dakota72421
item.description:
@dakota72421 wrote:

no mean to say something different on your thread but…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 04, 2007, 01:28:57 PM[/size][hr]can you help me on a part on my server?

Read full topic
item.source: Somebody, Can ya please help me with this..?

item.title: Somebody, Can ya please help me with this..?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Like I said, you double click on it… wait for it to say “Press any key to continue” or something near that, then press any key, and then run your server… just make sure your server is off when you compile.

Read full topic

Just go into your source’s folder and double-click on Compile…
